description: Numerators of Taylor series for exp(x)*cos(x).
comments: Lehmer sequence U_n for R=2 Q=1. [_Artur Jasinski_, Oct 06 2008]
references: G. W. Caunt, Infinitesimal Calculus, Oxford Univ. Press, 1914, p. 477.
formula: G.f.: (1+x-x^3)/(1+x^4).a(n) = (b^(n+1) - c^(n+1))/(b - c) where b = sqrt(2)-((1 + I)/sqrt(2)), c = (1 + I)/sqrt(2). [_Artur Jasinski_, Oct 06 2008]
mathematica: b = -((1 + I)/Sqrt[2]) + Sqrt[2]; c = (1 + I)/Sqrt[2]; Table[ Round[(b^n - c^n)/(b - c)], {n, 2, 200}] (* _Artur Jasinski_, Oct 06 2008 *)LinearRecurrence[{0, 0, 0, -1}, {1, 1, 0, -1}, 100] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Apr 01 2016 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
